title: Swachh Twitter Abhiyan
article_body: Last year, had accused of using fake followers to increase his social media profile. It turns out, at least from the recent , that PM Modi had nearly 18-times more fake followers than Gandhi. Here’s a look at how many followers Indian politicians lost in the recent purge.  Of course, this is nowhere close the decline in followers of several international icons. Pop star , who has the most followed account on Twitter lost 2.8 million followers. Others who saw a drop in followers include former US president , and . Here’s more on how many followers top Twitter users lost in the purge.
